sourcesContent:
<script>
import { Line } from 'vue-chartjs'

export default {
  name: 'ProjectProgressChart',
  extends: Line,
  props: {
    projects: {
      type: Array,
      default: () => []
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.renderChart(this.chartData, this.chartOptions)
  },
  computed: {
    chartData() {
      const projectNames = this.projects.slice(0, 5).map(p => p.name)
      const completionRates = this.projects.slice(0, 5).map(project => {
        if (!project.tasks || project.tasks.length === 0) return 0
        const completedTasks = project.tasks.filter(t => t.status === 'Done').length
        return Math.round((completedTasks / project.tasks.length) * 100)
      })

      return {
        labels: projectNames,
        datasets: [
          {
            label: 'Completion Rate (%)',
            data: completionRates,
            fill: true,
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(212, 197, 249, 0.2)',
            borderColor: 'rgba(212, 197, 249, 1)',
            borderWidth: 3,
            tension: 0.4,
            pointBackgroundColor: 'rgba(212, 197, 249, 1)',
            pointBorderColor: '#fff',
            pointBorderWidth: 2,
            pointRadius: 5,
            pointHoverRadius: 7
          }
        ]
      }
    },
    chartOptions() {
      return {
        responsive: true,
        maintainAspectRatio: false,
        plugins: {
          legend: {
            display: true,
            position: 'top',
            labels: {
              padding: 15,
              font: {
                size: 12,
                family: "'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif"
              },
              usePointStyle: true
            }
          },
          tooltip: {
            backgroundColor: 'rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9)',
            titleColor: '#333',
            bodyColor: '#666',
            borderColor: '#D4C5F9',
            borderWidth: 1,
            padding: 12,
            cornerRadius: 8,
            titleFont: {
              size: 14,
              weight: 'bold'
            },
            bodyFont: {
              size: 13
            }
          }
        },
        scales: {
          y: {
            beginAtZero: true,
            max: 100,
            ticks: {
              callback: function(value) {
                return value + '%'
              },
              font: {
                size: 11
              }
            },
            grid: {
              color: 'rgba(212, 197, 249, 0.1)'
            }
          },
          x: {
            grid: {
              display: false
            },
            ticks: {
              font: {
                size: 10
              },
              maxRotation: 45,
              minRotation: 0
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  watch: {
    projects: {
      deep: true,
      handler() {
        this.renderChart(this.chartData, this.chartOptions)
      }
    }
  }
}
</script>
<style scoped>
/* Ensure chart canvas doesn't overflow container */
</style>
